Title: And You Thought They Did Nothing
Description:
Hey sparky, you know what everyone forgets they need when they're flying around on dragons? Goggles.

You know what we sold out of today? Goggles.

You know what I need from you right now? You guessed it!
ObjectivesText: Craft 2 Milestone Magnifiers for Clinkyclick Shatterboom in Valdrakken.
